name: Groupvideocall
tagline: Kurento based webrtc video conference group call implementation in Node JS
body:
# groupvideocall
Kurento based webrtc video conference group call implementation in Node JS

#Running this tutorial
Edit global.js for default port under ~ as_uri: "https://0.0.0.0:8080/"

Run npm start or node bin/www 

#logging
Application generates logs under ~logs folder 
webapp.log -- all user group interactions
webrtc.log -- webrtc negotiation, ICE, Offer etc..
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
